message.body: I'm thinking tonight would be the perfect time for game night. Anyone want to dig their car out and play some board games?
Love the thought but my car isn't going anywhere. They aren't plowing my neighborhood and it'll all be solid ice!
####### might come up so you could hitch a ride with him
I'd rather stay off the roads entirely if I can help it. I don't think driving in the city tonight is a good idea. But thanks for the invitation :)
